annotations.description: I made real versions of the four original Perk-A-Cola's! What you crave for zombie horde combat in Call of Duty! Perk-A-Cola's have been a staple of the Zomb...
annotations.title: Perk-a-Cola's from Call of Duty| How to Drink

textContent:
.25 oz Creme de cacao
.5 oz Sweet Vermouth
1.5 oz Coffee Liquor
1 oz Rye
.5 oz Demerara Simple Syrup

Shake and strain into coup
